text: Rectiplanes is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Turridae, the turrids. ==Species== Species within the genus Rectiplanes include: * Rectiplanes delicatus (Okutani & Iwahori, 1992) ==References== ==External links== * Bartsch, P, Some turrid mollusks of Monterey Bay and vinicity; Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington, v. 57 p. 57-68 Category:Turridae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Rectiplanes
